Articles.Content: I have run into a bug that I am 99% sure is caused by some mod or conflict between mods but am unable to figure out which one. Currently if I am sitting on the launchpad I can click the resource panel and it works fine, but as soon as I have launched (assuming I DID NOT open the resource panel before launch) the resource panel button becomes unclickable and appears to be slightly "warped" (the word "Resource" looks ever so slightly "italic"). As a secondary consequence, I then also am unable to transfer fuel from one tank to another in that "Alt-click" does nothing. It's not a game breaker since I just have to remember to click it before launch but I was just wondering if anyone else ran into this as well?
Yeah I've had this problem too. I have no idea what causes it though.

Ummmm... What resource panel is this?

The resources tab.

I've had this problem a few times before, and I'm using a stock game. It's particularly annoying when it happens while I'm using an ant engine (which is where this bug usually occurs for me).
